E1B3AUD.original: ~z~He was a man, Brian - unlike you. Now get the fuck out of here.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~他是个爷们，Brian，不像你。现在给我滚蛋。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~It's all out war now, Johnny. Just like the old days.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~现在是全面战争了，Johnny。就像过去一样。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Okay boys, the time for pussy licking and ass kissing is over.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~好了，小的们，该拍的马屁都拍完了。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~We got Deadbeats to screw up. Come on.
~z~You're the one who wiped his ass on the truce to start with.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~还不是因为你在休战期找他们麻烦。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Answering a question like that's above my pay grade, man.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~这个问题我这等级的人回答不了，老兄。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Thanks for fucking this whole thing up over a little engine trouble, Brian.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~谢谢你为了一个小小的引擎故障把整件事都搞砸了，Brian。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You should have been watching Brian, Johnny. This one's on you.
~z~Wouldn't want to hurt you. I don't hit women.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~不想对你动手。我可不打女人。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You shouldn't fuck with The Lost MC.
~z~It's kind of lame. Have I offended you in some way?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~这就没意思了。我得罪你了吗？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Good thing you're glued to him then.
~z~Fucking Slav scumbag all the fucking same.
~z~Oh man, Tom Stubbs would love hanging out with you boys.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~哦老兄，Tom Stubbs会乐意认识认识你们的。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~I put some mescaline in with the weed, Dave,
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~我在草里混了点麦司卡林*，Dave，~n~(一种强力致幻剂)

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~by night, a knight of the road -
~z~Just don't make a habit of it.
~z~He hired a fucking Polack to do it.
~z~Look dude, you and me, shit seems kind of tense lately, doesn't it?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~看，伙计，你我之间，最近似乎有点紧张，不是吗？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~See Johnny? I told you this truce meant nothing.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~你看吧，Johnny？我就说休战纯粹是放屁。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~with a grey flannel suit and make a nice, steady income.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~挡住霸气的纹身，就有稳定的收入。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Brian, Brian, are you sure you want to be here? I mean this is a man's job after all.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~Brian，Brian，你确定要跟着来吗？这事毕竟是男人干的。
~z~我说，Dave，你该不会是个双性恋吧？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Billy, Billy, did you see these guys?
~z~Shit Johnny, the speed you're going you'd think you didn't want to save the brothers.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~我操，Johnny，你这么慢，是不是不想去救兄弟们啊。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Expand your horizons. Life is war, man.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~目光长远点。人生就是战争，伙计。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~See you boys back at the clubhouse.
~z~Stay in formation, Johnny. Get behind me.
~z~You tried to jump our brothers? You're gonna pay for it.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~敢偷袭我们的人？你们会付出代价的。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~battling the very corporate forces he represents -
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~和他代表的企业力量奋力斗争。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, not to his face at least. I bet you'd stab him in the back though.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~是啊，起码不会明着来。我看你肯定会背地里捅刀子。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Billy, you fucking killed him, Johnny. You let him die.
~z~In the meantime, let's take a moment to remember Jason
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~现在，让我们花点时间，缅怀一下Jason
~z~死妈天使，死妈天使，死妈天使。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Word is there's another skirmish. Come on.
~z~and her heavy duty father didn't much like it.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~但那婆娘的疯子父亲不太高兴。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You're outta line, John boy. Stick behind me.
~z~Things have grown up, brother. You want to survive, you got to grow up too.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~世道变了啊，兄弟。想活下去，就必须成长。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~So are you gonna fight alongside your brothers or are you going to join the Deadbeats?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~你是要和兄弟们并肩作战，还是加入死妈天使？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~The Deadbeats are shit kicking the brothers. Stick with me.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~死妈天使在招惹我们的兄弟。跟紧我。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~We're only as fast as the slowest brother.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~车队的速度都看最慢的弟兄。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~I hope you can grow a heart one of these days
~z~Polish/ Russian/ Serb - I don't really give a shit.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~波兰人，俄国人，塞尔维亚人——我管他哪国人。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Brothers, we will find a way to get payback against this
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~兄弟们，我们一定要向这个人复仇，

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~In these perilous times it's more important than ever
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~在这种艰难的时刻，就更加需要

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Billy knew what he was getting himself into.
~z~Yeah? I thought the responsibility might be yours, what with your being leader and all. Later on, brother.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~啥？我还以为责任在你，你是老大，什么都是你的。以后再说吧，伙计。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~and all the other men who've given the finger
~z~You Deadbeats think you can fuck with The Lost?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~死妈天使还敢跟失落帮对着干？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~and he was scared of precisely jack shit.
~z~Yes. And during the week, you cover up those nice, gnarly tattoos
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~没错。平日里，穿上你的灰色法兰绒西装，

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Oh yeah, I fucking love you, man.
~z~Shit, I can't hear you, big man. It's the wind. Speak up next time.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~妈的，我听不见，大哥。风太大。下次喊大声点。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You start leaving bikes behind, you'll start leaving brothers behind.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~现在把车落下，以后早晚把弟兄们抛下。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~There's another ruckus going on. Hope you brothers are in the shit kickin' mood.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~战争还没结束。希望兄弟们还在状态。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Come on, brothers, get on your bikes. These Deadbeats have been taught a valuable lesson about respect.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~走吧，兄弟们，上车了。死妈天使已经学到了什么是尊重。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, yeah, are you fucking kidding me? Where?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~嗯，嗯，你他妈的开玩笑吗？在哪儿？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Saddle up, brothers. These fucks are dead.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~准备上车，兄弟们。这些混蛋都死了。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~As much as I'd like to kick your ass, Brian. I could never go against a brother.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~我很想揍你一顿，Brian。但我永远都不能和兄弟作对。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~The brothers are getting jumped, come on bitch.
~z~More Deadbeats on the funeral pyre. Get on your choppers.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~死妈天使都进火葬场了。上车。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You forgotten your place, soldier? Stay behind the ride captain.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~忘记自己的位置了，士兵？待在行车长后面。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You must be an American, man - you understand hypocrisy so damn well.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~绝逼是纯种美国人啊，伙计，你太了解什么叫作虚伪了。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, yeah, you're right man. Fuck it.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~是啊，是啊，你是对的，伙计。去他妈的。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Time was we'd kick ass with baseball bats, not SMGs. Now that was fun.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~以前的快乐源泉是棒球棍，不是冲锋枪。还是以前好啊。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Now Jason was, he was just a kid,
~z~would you fuck off for a second - I got to talk to Billy.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~你能给我消失一会吗，我得和Billy谈谈。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Now, you can't tell me this don't give you a kick, brother.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~这下你总该血脉偾张了吧，兄弟。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~I just got word that Jason's been killed up in Broker.
~z~Hey, lady, you forget how to twist the throttle?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，女士，你是忘了油门怎么拧吗？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Ride safe, brothers. We'll see you at the house.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~一路顺风，兄弟们。我们会所见。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~to this shitty little thing that we call conformity.
~z~Sure, that makes a whole lotta sense. Thanks for the ride, Bill.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~确实，这话说得很有道理。谢谢你送我一程，Bill。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You ready to break some more heads? I heard some bitches are getting smart.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~准备好再大杀特杀一次了吗？听说又有贱人自以为是了。
~z~这些死妈天使就是死性不改。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Wish us luck, my brothers. We'll see you back.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~祝我们好运，兄弟们。我们回头见。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Tell me, brother. How am I supposed to lead this motley crew of bikers, without a bike?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~告诉我，兄弟。没有车子，老子带领个屁飞车党？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~They was mad but, see, there was only two of them.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~他们暴叫如雷，不过他们就两个人。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~The days when we had all the pigs this side of the West River coming down on us? Those happy days?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~西河这边的条子都冲我们来的日子？那段快乐时光？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~We don't forgive. We don't. We don't.
~z~You talk and talk about sticking it to the man and then you hang out with a lawyer?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~你口口声声喊着反抗权威，结果和律师混在一起？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~No time for ass scratching, Johnny. Come on.
~z~we can give the pain the finger.
~z~They're not going to mess with me while I'm with Bill. Ha ha. No one fucks with Bill.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~和Bill在一起他们就惹不起了。哈哈。没人敢招惹Bill。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~I'm a complicated individual and I've got serious authority issues.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~我是个复杂的人，还有严重的权威情结*。~n~(指脑子反抗权威，身体顺从权威)

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Maybe you should just stay in the clubhouse, Brian. You ain't much help out here with the big boys.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~你就该待在会所里的，Brian。在这里帮不上大爷几个的忙。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~And through this life, through this brotherhood,
~z~It doesn't matter if every bastard in the world is standing against you as long as you're with your brothers.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~只要和弟兄们在一起，就算和世界上的所有混蛋为敌都无所谓。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~he may be a politician, but he ain't no square.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~他的确是个政客，但不是一个正经人。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~War's back on, Deadbeats. Lost MC forever!
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~战争又开始了，死妈天使。失落帮万岁！

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~he always had time for a brother in need,
~z~Some of your boys jumped my brothers.
~z~You going to write your autobiography or something?
~z~I'm not too big a man to wipe a brother's ass when he shits himself, Johnny.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~我的架子还没大到不帮兄弟擦屁股，Johnny。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Man, the Deadbeats seem real annoyed. If I was you, I'd be scared they'd attack me in the street.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~伙计，死妈天使似乎真发飙了。如果我是你，就该担心在街上被他们袭击了。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~You're on the wrong side of the West River, pricks.
~z~Alright all of you, let's go! Let's go.
~z~Time to move out, Johnny. Come on.
~z~I didn't think so, I guessed you just liked cock.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~我不这么认为，我猜你只喜欢老二。
~z~你们这些种族主义者真恶心。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Johnny. Johnny. Give me a shout if you need any help there.
~z~Big boys. Heh heh heh. You're a homo, Johnny.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~大爷几个。呵呵呵。你个死基佬，Johnny。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~He's cool - he's a lawyer - he can help us with shit.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~他很牛，他是个律师，能帮我们摆平些事。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~In short - the kinda of man I'd want to be.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~说白了——就是我想成为的那种人。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~I think he was a Serb, Brian.
~z~No, Johnny, nope. You're the fucking pussy, man.
~z~He's got some business contacts that'll appeal to your newly minted business mind.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~他有政商界的人脉，能跟你萌生的商业头脑产生共鸣。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Bill did good back there, you could learn a lot from watching him in a fight.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~Bill打了场漂亮仗，看他干架你能学到很多。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~but he hit the throttle harder than most of us, huh?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~但他骑车比我们中的大多数人都猛，是吧？
~z~死妈天使的援兵来了，兄弟们。

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Then what do you say we put all this shit behind us?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~那，你说我们把这一切都忘了怎样？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Pre-emptive strike, my brother. And fuck me if it wasn't the right move.
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~先发制人啊，好兄弟。要是我做错了，我就去死，好不好？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~so I'd be very careful if I were you.
~z~Yeah, I need to do some learning. Mind if I practice on you, Brian?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~是啊，我是得多学着点。介意我拿你练习吗，Brian？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~Shit. Brian's gone and fucking bought it.
~z~Now get the hell out of my face.
~z~he got any piece of hole he wanted,
~z~And right now I think he's tripping his face off...
~z~Why don't you come up with an answer and earn those stripes, Billy?
E1B3AUD.translated: ~z~你还是自己想个答案，多升两条杠吧，Billy？

E1B3AUD.original: ~z~No, you'd a been okay, because you are a...
~z~You like Mr. David Grossman then Johnny?
